title: Broken pages with + on the url

content.raw:
1. Go into a tutorial which has more than one version, for example [Building a world](http://www.gazebosim.org/tutorials?cat=build_world&tut=build_world). You should be at version 2.2+ by default.

1. Using the top-right box, choose Version: 1.9, the tutorial loads fine.

1. Now using the same box, go back to 2.2+, you'll go to [this](http://www.gazebosim.org/tutorials?cat=build_world&tut=build_world&ver=2.2+) page, which is broken and mixed up with bitbucket. It seems to be a problem for all urls containing +.

![tutorial_broken.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/RMMxjX/images/3043997780-tutorial_broken.png)
content.html:
1. Go into a tutorial which has more than one version, for example Building a world. You should be at version 2.2+ by default.

  2. Using the top-right box, choose Version: 1.9, the tutorial loads fine.

  3. Now using the same box, go back to 2.2+, you'll go to this page, which is broken and mixed up with bitbucket. It seems to be a problem for all urls containing +.
